question: Who of the following will address global IT event on Feb 19 in Hyderabad?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will deliver the inaugural address at the World Congress on Information Technology 2018 (WCIT) from February 19. This is for the first time that the WICT is being held in the country. The WCIT's official page on the Nasscom website also indicates that Sri Lankan Prime Minister Ranil Wickramasinghe, Union IT Minister Ravi Shankar Prasad, state Chief Minister K Chandrasekhar Rao and Sophia the humanoid are expected to speak at the three-day event.
